casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2011-0212. State v. Lloyd.

Holmes App. No. 09 CA 12, 2010-Ohio-6562. Discretionary appeal accepted on Proposition of Law No. II.

Pfeifer and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., would also accept the appeal on Proposition of Law Nos. I, III, IV, and V. McGee Brown, J., would also accept the appeal on Proposition of Law Nos. Ill, IV, and V. O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., dissent.
